title: Auth: Sign Up / Login with Role Assignment
body: As a user, I want to sign up and choose my role (Founder or Investor) so I can access my specific dashboard.

title: Auth: Session Persistence & Logout
body: As a user, I want to stay logged in during the session and be able to log out securely.

title: Founder: Create Company Profile
body: As a Founder, I want to create a company profile with fields like name, industry, stage, and description.

title: Founder: Add Team Members
body: As a Founder, I want to add co-founders and employees with roles and equity percentages.

title: Founder: View Compliance Status
body: As a Founder, I want to see KYB/KYC compliance status on my dashboard.

title: Documents: Upload Pitch Deck
body: As a Founder, I want to upload pitch decks and term sheets with proper labels and access control.

title: Documents: Embed Document Using pgvector
body: As a system, I want to chunk and embed uploaded documents for semantic search and matching.

title: Investor: Browse Fundable Startups
body: As an Investor, I want to browse a list of available startups with industry filters.

title: Investor: View Company Details & Metrics
body: As an Investor, I want to view a companyâ€™s profile, metrics, and uploaded documents.

title: Investor: Request Intro / Commit to Invest
body: As an Investor, I want to express interest or commit to invest in a company or SPV.

title: SPV: Show Active SPVs
body: As a Founder, I want to view active SPVs linked to my company.

title: Cap Table: Render Cap Table Viewer
body: As a user, I want to view a simplified cap table showing equity classes and ownership percentage.

title: Semantic Matching: Embed Investor & Company Profiles
body: As a system, I want to embed profiles using vector representations for smart search.

title: Semantic Matching: Build Matching API for Investors
body: As an Investor, I want to find relevant startups based on my investment thesis via semantic search.

title: Notifications: Notify Founder When Deck is Viewed
body: As a Founder, I want to be notified when an Investor views my deck or profile.

title: Notifications: Basic Notification Center
body: As a user, I want to see all my notifications in one place.

title: Deployment: Smoke Test Dashboards
body: As a QA or dev, I want to test both dashboards (Founder/Investor) to ensure they render correctly.

title: Deployment: Deploy MVP to Vercel
body: As a dev, I want to deploy the working MVP to Vercel for demo access.

title: Deployment: Seed Sample Data
body: As a dev, I want to seed 2 Founders, 2 Investors, and 2 Companies with sample docs for demo purposes.
